title: A N D Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Take-out, Bakery
description: Following up on their previous successful venture, Off the Griddle food truck, the owners, Ashley and Dan, opened this breakfast and lunch diner in Nov 2011. Offers classic American comfort foods in vegan and vegetarian versions, with items like vegan mac & chz, waffles with fruit, biscuit sandwich, veg meatloaf sandwich, biscuits and gravy, plus daily vegan specials. Non-dairy milks provided for coffee drinks.
